page.title: 19Attitudes in Woburn 3
page.content: {Attitudes to Facilities} Most people in Woburn think that there is quite a reasonable selection of shops in the village, but there could be a few more practical shops like a fishmongers and a chemist. The{only bus}that passes through Woburn is one from{Bedford.}There is none that go to the main shopping centre in{Milton Keynes,}but most people would like one. One of the shop keepers thought that there were enough buses, but this is probably because people would stop going to her shop if they could get to Milton Keynes where goods are cheaper. Many people feel that Woburn needs a{by-pass}because the roads often become congested with heavy lorries. Parked cars also cause congestion, so people think yellow lines should be painted along the High Street and a car park should be built.
